SELECT AH.*, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ( SELECT A.AH_KEYNO , B.MN_KEYNO , CASE WHEN B.MN_LEV = '0' THEN '메인페이지' ELSE B.MN_NAME END MN_NAME , C.MN_NAME MN_HOMEDIV_NAME , B.MN_HOMEDIV_C FROM T_ACTIVITY_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER B ON A.AH_MENU = B.MN_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER C ON B.MN_HOMEDIV_C = C.MN_KEYNO WHERE 1=1
AND AH_OS != 'searchbot'
AND C.MN_HOMEDIV_C = #{HOME_DIV}
AND B.MN_KEYNO IS NOT NULL AND A.AH_SESSION IS NOT NULL
AND AH_DEVICE = 'P'
AND AH_DEVICE != 'P'
AND date_format(AH_DATE,'%Y-%M-%d') >= date_format(#{STDT},'%Y-%M-%d')
AND date_format(AH_DATE,'%Y-%M-%d') <= date_format(#{ENDT},'%Y-%M-%d')
GROUP BY B.MN_KEYNO, A.AH_SESSION
GROUP BY B.MN_KEYNO, A.AH_DEVICE, A.AH_SESSION
) AH GROUP BY MN_KEYNO ORDER BY COUNT DESC;

SELECT AH.*, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ( SELECT K.* FROM( SELECT A.AH_KEYNO ,A.AH_SESSION , B.MN_KEYNO , CASE WHEN B.MN_LEV = '0' THEN '메인페이지' ELSE B.MN_NAME END MN_NAME , C.MN_NAME MN_HOMEDIV_NAME , B.MN_HOMEDIV_C FROM T_ACTIVITY_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER B ON A.AH_MENU = B.MN_KEYNO LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER C ON B.MN_HOMEDIV_C = C.MN_KEYNO WHERE 1=1 AND AH_OS != 'searchbot' AND B.MN_KEYNO IS NOT NULL AND A.AH_SESSION IS NOT NULL
AND date_format(AH_DATE,'%Y-%M-%d') >= date_format(#{STDT},'%Y-%M-%d')
AND date_format(AH_DATE,'%Y-%M-%d') <= date_format(#{ENDT},'%Y-%M-%d')
LIMIT 80000 )K GROUP BY K.MN_KEYNO, K.AH_SESSION ) AH GROUP BY MN_KEYNO ORDER BY COUNT DESC LIMIT 5
